alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 5:02PM CDT until June 27 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 502 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Texline to 9 miles south of Ware to 12 miles northeast of Romero, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus, Sunray, Ware and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
